data.title: Congress Crisis
data.sub_title: Congress attempts reinvention with Bharat Jodo Yatra and a new president
data.content: The Indian National Congress has faced three major challenges in the current political conjuncture defined by the growing influence of the Right and the polarisation engendered by it.
data.author: By Ranjani Mazumdar
